Class ec.e.hab.Designator 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----ec.e.hab.Designator
public class Designator
extends Object
Abstract base class for Objects which designate templates stored by the Haberdashery.

Designator()
Since this is an abstract class, this constructor should never be called directly.

getNull()
Get the one and only 'null' Designator.
getRoot()
Get the one and only 'root' Designator.
getUnknown()
Get the one and only 'unknown' Designator.
isDirect()
Test if this is a direct Designator.
isNull()
Test if this is the 'null' Designator.
isRoot()
Test if this is the 'root' Designator.
isUnknown()
Test if this is the 'unknown' Designator.

Designator 
  protected Designator()
Since this is an abstract class, this constructor should never be called directly.

isDirect 
  public boolean isDirect()
Test if this is a direct Designator.
Returns:
true if direct, false if indirect.
isNull 
  public boolean isNull()
Test if this is the 'null' Designator.
Returns:
true iff this is the 'null' Designator.
getNull 
  public static Designator getNull()
Get the one and only 'null' Designator.
Returns:
The 'null' Designator.
isUnknown 
  public boolean isUnknown()
Test if this is the 'unknown' Designator.
Returns:
true iff this is the 'unknown' Designator.
getUnknown 
  public static Designator getUnknown()
Get the one and only 'unknown' Designator.
Returns:
The 'unknown' Designator.
isRoot 
  public boolean isRoot()
Test if this is the 'root' Designator.
Returns:
true iff this is the 'root' Designator.
getRoot 
  public static Designator getRoot()
Get the one and only 'root' Designator.
Returns:
The 'root' Designator.
